text_block_list.text: What I encountered that day― could probably be called my Sun.
―Since I had become a trainer, the miserable days had continued. Even though all my colleagues already had Uma Musume they were responsible for……
choice_data_list: (Am I the only one falling short……?)

text_block_list.text: Are ya livin' it up～～!?
Huh, feelin' kinda blue!? Eh, eh, gloom and doom? Then, you just need to let loose!
Anyway, just leave it to me～! Now, C'mon☆
Weiweiii～♪ Bwanbwanbwanbwaaaaa～n!
Hee～y, you're bummin' me out here～!! Ya gotta hit me with those wicked vibes♪ Check it☆
I had no idea who she was, and no clue what was going on, but she dragged me here and now was trying to get something started……!?

text_block_list.name: Gyaru-Guy
text_block_list.text: Oooh～, if it ain't Daitaku Helios-chan!? What, you gonna start a Live～? We～i!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Wee～i☆ Rather than a Live～, more like anything goes! Goin' with whatever flows～

text_block_list.name: Rapper
text_block_list.text: Yo, Helios! Make sure ya pass me the microphone! 'Cuz this here's a part of my time zone!

text_block_list.name: Dancer
text_block_list.text: Heyoo～. Heard we could do some dancin'. Mind if we cut in?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: 'Course! Dance it out! I'll be on stage too～♪

text_block_list.name: Passerby A
text_block_list.text: Hey, looks like there's some kind of event! Want to take a look? Or maybe we should go up on stage～?
Daitaku Helios― with her being at the center, more and more people that seemed like her aquaintances kept gathering. It was creating quite a stir……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: We～～～～i!! If you wanna raise the roof, put your hands up! And can I get a Hoo-ooh!?

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Hoo-ooh!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Again, let me really hear ya! C'mon, Hoo-oooh!?

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Hoo-ooh!!!!
I didn't really get it, but I was still getting swept up in the moment…… my body just moved naturally.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yeaaaa-! Y'all rock!! We vibin' now～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa, uhahaha～♪♪

text_block_list.name: Dancer
text_block_list.text: ――Helios, mad props～. That was fire～! You really are the best. See ya-, hit me up on LANE.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: We～i, Bye bye-……Ah. Oh! You've got a good look on your face now☆ Absolute King～!
When I was feeling down, she went out of her way to drag me here and brighten my day. I wanted to say thank you but―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eh, no idea what you mean, weird!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I don't really get it, but you let loose, right? Let's hang out again～! Ah, give me your LANE! Umasta works too!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―Ah, so you're a trainer! I go to Tracen Academy too-☆ Is this fate? Classic～. I'll hit you up on LANE, see ya Trai-pippi～!
……in the end I just couldn't keep up with her energy. But still, it was a fact that I was feeling better just by having a good time.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: ―Sorry. I'm looking for a trainer that is a bit more reli-…… umm, has more career experience! I'll be leaving now～!
As part of a fresh start, I had found the courage to speak to several girls that I felt had some promise but……
I understood the girls' point of view. A trainer was an incredibly important existence to the life of an athlete…… so being cautious was expected. But―
choice_data_list: But if I can't get a contract……

text_block_list.text: How about with me?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: A trainer contract, right? I'm free, so sure☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: A seal right? I need that, right? Wonder if there's an app? Lame～ can't I just put my name?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hm?
choice_data_list: Are you fine deciding so quickly!?
Are you fine deciding so quickly!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Feelings-wise I don't see a problem～. But if you can't then we can let it go! Bye☆
As a trainer, there was no doubt this was a chance. But, without knowing much about her, it wouldn't be good for her sake to just blindly accept.
choice_data_list: At least, let me see you run first―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Sound! Okay, let's get this going then☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ah, might as well make it a festival right? Mock-race themed! I'll go spread the word, let's meet up on the grounds later～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ―Heyoo-. Let's get rollin'☆
choice_data_list: Wait wait wait, wait a minute!!
Wait wait wait, wait a minute!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hm? Bwahahaha, what's up? You're sweatin' bullets! I'm dyin' here～!
Of course I'd be sweating. The opponents that Daitaku Helios had brought with her―
Were all the strong Uma Musume from this generation who had already gotten results in big races, including G1s……!
